title: Analysis of the Impact of Wikipedia Utilization on Graduate-Level Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational research methodologies and basic scientific knowledge
context.additional_context: Students conduct research design and data analysis in a non-real-time LMS environment using digital devices, with project-based assessments measuring learning outcomes.

learning_goals: Learners can design a systematic survey analyzing Wikipedia usage patterns.
Learners can quantitatively evaluate the impact of Wikipedia utilization on learning efficiency in science disciplines.
Learners can propose Wikipedia utilization strategies in academic writing based on research findings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
